Class CD

java.lang.Object
domain.Media
domain.CD
public class CD extends Media
Represents a Compact Disc (CD) media item with artist information and specific borrowing/fine policy.

CDs can be borrowed for a shorter period than books and incur a higher fine per overdue day.

    • CD

      public CD(String id, String title, String artist)
      Creates a new CD with the given identifier, title, and artist.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for this CD
      title - the title of the CD
      artist - the recording artist name
